Posted By: Phil
I am looking to purchase T206s that are graded only by SGC with a grade of 50 or higher.  If anyone has a list of some for sale, please email your list with asking price.

Thanks....

Posted By: Cy
Hi Phil,

I tried to E-mail you but my E-mails were bounced back. I have several SGC 50 T206 cards for sale, plus a T206 Dummy Taylor card for sale.

Here is the link to my T206 cards. Let me know if you would like any of the cards.

[url]http://www.cyscards.com/t206.htm[/url]
